price: Nta cyo wasigaga mu byo wahuraga na byo utakigize umuyonga.
arabic: مَا تَذَرُ مِن شَيۡءٍ أَتَتۡ عَلَيۡهِ إِلَّا جَعَلَتۡهُ كَٱلرَّمِيمِ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: mā tadharu min shayin atat ʿalayhi illā jaʿalathu kal-ramīmi
